mapper.sql: year, prepaid_company_number, amount, register_capital, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date
mapper.select: select year as year, amount as amount from prepaid_company_statistic where year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select pcs.year, c.prepaid_company_number, pcs.amount, c.register_capital, pcs.create_by, pcs.create_date, pcs.update_by, pcs.update_date from prepaid_company_statistic pcs , ( select y ,count(1) prepaid_company_number ,sum(ctype*rc) register_capital from (select year(cp.registered_date) y , if(cp.registered_capital_type=2,6.3,1) ctype ,cp.registered_capital rc from company cp where cp.company_type=11) c GROUP BY y ) c where c.y=pcs.year order by year asc

select c.company_id companyId, c.name companyName, c.record_number recordNumber, car.analysis_result analysisResult, c.business_type businessType
from company c left join company_analysis_result car on car.company_id=c.company_id where c.company_type=11
order by car.analysis_result desc

SELECT car.analysis_result AS currentLevel, c.`name` AS `name`, c.legal_person AS legalPerson, c.registered_capital AS registeredCapital, c.registered_capital_type AS registeredCapitalType FROM company c LEFT JOIN company_analysis_result car ON car.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.company_type = 11 AND c.`name` = #{name}
